description: Leanne Williams, 47, was found dead at home and a post-mortem examination showed assault injuries.
title: Swansea: Man in court charged with murder of Leanne Williams, 47
title_page: Swansea: Man in court charged with murder of Leanne Williams, 47 - BBC News
maintext:
A 33-year-old man has appeared in court charged with murder after a woman's body was found at her home.
Leanne Williams, 47, was found dead at a house on Gomer Road, Townhill, Swansea on 27 February.
A post-mortem examination found she had suffered "significant injuries consistent with an assault".
Matthew Battenbough, of no fixed address, spoke only to confirm his name and date of birth at Swansea Magistrates' Court on Wednesday.
He was remanded in custody to next appear at Swansea Crown Court.
